description: A Java Data Transfer Object (DTO) class named MessageResponse used to encapsulate message response data in the intelligent chat bot service API.

classes.name: MessageResponse
classes.description: A DTO class representing a message response, including metadata such as ID, conversation ID, role, message type, content, payload, and creation timestamp.

methods.name: MessageResponse(UUID, UUID, String, String, String, String, OffsetDateTime)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to instantiate MessageResponse with specific values.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the message.

methods.name: getConversationId()
methods.description: Returns the conversation identifier associated with this message.

methods.name: getRole()
methods.description: Returns the role associated with this message (e.g., user, bot).

methods.name: getPayload()
methods.description: Returns additional payload data associated with the message.

methods.name: getCreatedAt()
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the message was created.
